io.github.vaqxai

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.vaqxai.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ClientHandler
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class handles a single client that's connected to the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientHandler(Socket socket)
      Creates a ClientHandler with the provided server socket, and a response callback.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientHandler

        public ClientHandler(Socket socket)
        Creates a ClientHandler with the provided server socket, and a response callback.

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoResponse

        public void setAutoResponse(Function<String,String> newCallback)
        Changes this server's client's automatic response callback
        Parameters:
        newCallback - the new callback, return "" to stop the server from sending an automatic response.

      • getAutoResponse

        Returns:
        the current callback function

      • getSocket

        public Socket getSocket()
        Returns:
        this client's socket for direct interface

      • send

        public void send(Object message)
        Parameters:
        message - send data directly to this client

      • get

        public String get()
        Returns:
        get latest message the client has sent to us (will hang its thread if there's no incoming messages)

        Specified by:
